posts.post_content:
Hey everyone,

I'm looking for some commons for my husband for Christmas.  I'd like to be in the $25-40 per card range. List of names below.

Please PM me with asking price and pictures.  I don't typically check often but I did put an alarm to check on here every day mid-morning and evening (what can I say, I'm a dedicated wife haha) so please bear with me if there's a little delay before I respond.  Once I get on though, I can pay immediately if all is good to go!

Some of the names he needs are:

Burch (fielding)
Cassidy
Charles
Conroy (Bat)
Cravath
Criger
Davidson
Dessau
Donlin (field)
Donlin (Seated)
Donohue
Dooin
Dorner
Dougherty (portrait)
Downey (field)
Downs
Dubuc
Dunn (Balt)
Dygert
Easterly
Egan
Engle
Evans
Ewing
Ferguson
Flanagan
Fletcher
Ford
Fromme

Thanks! 

Jenni

an awesome wife!


Good luck!


I may post something similar to get some surprise T206s sent to my wife to put in my Christmas stocking too!
sorry, can't help, with this list.  Good luck.  Great shopping idea.

Hi Jenni ! I was half way hoping your were my wife, Jennifer, but alas, I have a few of those cards you listed.

Great wife!

May have a few here: [URL="http://t206.monkberry.com/t206.html"]http://t206.monkberry.com/t206.html[/URL]

Do you have any single sisters?
